configItem.name: loglen
configItem.description: Specifies the maximum number of xpl messages to store in the log file.

configItem.name: lpath
configItem.description: Specifies the path where the log file will be saved.

configItem.name: xml
configItem.description: Specifies the name of the log file.

configItem.name: xsl
configItem.description: Specifies the name of the xsl file that transforms the xml log file. Leave blank for no transform.

configItem.name: out
configItem.description: Specifies the name of the output file created by the xsl transform. Leave blank for no transform.
